speaker.title: JavaScript and Accessibility: Building Thoughtful Interactions
speaker.description:
Building accessibility into modern web applications is an often-overlooked ethical requirement. _Every_ user should be able to use our applications! With the complexity of the web in 2020, there are more and more potential pitfalls in developing accessible interactions with JavaScript frameworks.

In this talk, we'll walk through common mistakes, discuss repeatable accessibility strategies, and learn how to build accessibility testing into the development process.
